properties.Name: OrderAdjustment
properties.Description: An adjustment applied to an Order.

Columns.Name: OrderId
Columns.Description: The unique number that identifies an Order.

Columns.Name: AdjustmentId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Adjustment.

Columns.Name: OrderAdjustmentAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of the order adjustment.

Columns.Name: OrderAdjustmentNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding an Order Adjustment.
